title: Client breaking every time I try to start a game?
body: Doesn't matter if it's ARAM, Normals, or Bots, any time I try to start a game, my client immediately bugsplats, says it detected an issue in my installation and forces me to repair. Is there any way to prevent the client from inventing a problem every time I want to play a game?

replies.body: My game has done this almost every 3rd game, Ive been kicked out of promos so many times, and also placed in Low prio ques for 20mins. I am getting so fed up - I have repaired, reinstalled, updated drivers but it happened again just before - im trying to enjoy myself and climb but I am close to going to find a new game

Crashing in any mode absolutely sucks and I'm sorry it's happening.  The good news is that it's a bugsplat, which gives us a good foundation of what might be causing this, like outdated drivers or corrupt game files.  I recommend going over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune  things up.

You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a reinstall in case the repair is missing the mark.  I hope that helps!
